So, apparently in **South Korea** there are things called “**WiFi eggs**”.

You rent them at the airport, and take it with you, while you are in South Korea.

(And return it at airport when you fly out.)

For example:

⁁ 1535431974/wifi-egg.jpeg

The //WiFi egg// provides you with Internet (while you are in South Korea).

To use it, you connect your phone to it via WiFi.
